title: What are the differences between Poco M2 Pro vs Poco X2? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not much difference 😉 you will notice in day to day usage. The difference between POCO X2 & POCO M2 Pro is, POCO X2 Comes with 4500mAh Battery (27W fast Charge)POCO M2 Pro comes with 5000mAh Battery (33W fast Charge)POCO X2 Loaded with Snapdragon730G SoCPOCO M2 Pro Loaded with Snapdragon720G SoC Mohd. Hussain  (@ThisIsShaikh) | Twitter
